channel.title: Shiny on Functionally Defined
channel.description: Recent content in Shiny on Functionally Defined

item.title: A Shiny app to find your nearest Arby's
item.description: Sometimes your inspirations for data visualizations come from strange places. I can’t say I remember how Arby’s came into a recent conversation with my friends, but someone made a joke about the restaurant chain and the thing that popped into my mind was, “I can make a Shiny app for that.” So that’s the general overview for how this post came to be.
